method.name: invoke
method.description: Invoke the function forwading the passed arguments. The number of arguments must match the function's prototype. If any of the argument values don't match the type defined by the prototype, the call errors and returns [code]null[/code].

method.name: invokev
method.description: Invoke the function passing it all arguments in [param args]. The number of arguments must match the function's prototype. If any of the argument values don't match the type defined by the prototype, the call errors and returns [code]null[/code].
